title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 42.6 - Federal Americans with Disabilities Act
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 42.6 - Federal Americans with Disabilities Act

State Regulations

Facilities constructed pursuant to this Part shall comply
with the requirements of the Federal Americans with Disabilities

Act. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
42.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
